name: Osdrum
description:
COME PLAY OSDRUM ! A game where you incarn an hybrid between an OSTRICH and a DRUM ! You play in a Space Opera, in a world full of instruments, and you can do EVERYTHING YOU WANT ! 

Osdrum is a third-person sandbox game in which you embody a slightly crazy hybrid between an ostrich and a drum. The character increases its sound volume by gaining speed, and can thus interact with several elements of the game. The goal of the game is to complete quests given in-game in a 3 stages opera lost in space with decorative elements based on instruments and music.

This game was produced in 10 weeks as part of our end-of-year projects in second year of the French school of digital and multimedia creativity, E-artsup Montpellier.

Our Team is composed of 10 people :

  • Noam Kurower (Producter Owner/ Code)
  • Vincent Muffato (Scrum Master/ Code)
  • Morgan Baudin (Graph 3D/ Lead Graph)
  • Timothée Kamm (Graph 3D/ Level Designer)
  • Maxime Béal (Graph 3D)
  • Lucas Dailly (Graph 3D)
  • Pauline De Dominici (Graph 3D/ UI)
  • Eric Pouget (Graph 3D/ UI)
  • Antoine Morisset (Compositor)
  • Pierre Palmer (Sound Designer)
